stories.title: View Default Content for 'Origin' Tab
stories.description: As a user, I want to view the default content under the 'Origin' tab so that I can learn about the history of Lorem Ipsum.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I view the interface, Then the tab with text 'Origin' should be highlighted by default and content starting with 'Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text...' should be visible.

stories.title: Interact with 'What' Tab
stories.description: As a user, I want to click on the 'What' tab so that I can view its content.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the default tab is highlighted as 'Origin', When I click on the tab with text 'What', Then the content under 'What' should be displayed, and the tab should be highlighted.

stories.title: Interact with 'Use' Tab
stories.description: As a user, I want to click on the 'Use' tab so that I can view its content.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the default tab is highlighted as 'Origin', When I click on the tab with text 'Use', Then the content under 'Use' should be displayed, and the tab should be highlighted.

stories.title: Interact with 'More' Tab
stories.description: As a user, I want to click on the 'More' tab so that I can view its content.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the default tab is highlighted as 'Origin', When I click on the tab with text 'More', Then the content under 'More' should be displayed, and the tab should be highlighted.
